Kushina, while in her awakening state, delivers a series of powerful punches to the opponent. 

== Trivia ==
* Kushina remarks that she is "squishing them like a tomato" when she performs this technique.
* When this technique is used on [[Minato Namikaze]], the animation changes. Kushina bashfully slaps him instead, albeit launching him a considerable distance.
